instruction: How do I open a bank account?
output: To open a bank account, visit our website and follow the instructions in the 'Open an Account' section. You will need a valid ID and proof of address.

instruction: How can I reset my password?
output: To reset your password, click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page. You will receive a link via email to create a new password.

instruction: How do I apply for a loan?
output: Log in to your account and go to the 'Loans' section. Fill out the loan application form and submit it. We will contact you for further steps.

instruction: What are the bank fees?
output: Bank fees vary depending on the services used. Please refer to our fee schedule available on our website for detailed information.

instruction: How do I activate my bank card?
output: To activate your bank card, call the number on the back of the card or use our mobile app.

instruction: How can I check my account balance?
output: You can check your account balance by logging in to your online account or via our mobile app.

instruction: How do I report a lost or stolen card?
output: If your card is lost or stolen, contact our customer service immediately to report it and request a replacement.

instruction: How do I make a transfer?
output: Log in to your account, go to 'Transfers', and follow the instructions to make a transfer.

instruction: How can I get an account statement?
output: Your account statements are available online in the 'Statements' section. You can also request to receive them by mail.

instruction: How do I contact customer service?
output: You can contact our customer service by phone, email, or through the live chat available on our website.

instruction: What data protection measures are in place for my personal data?
input: Terms and Conditions for Banking Services, section 'Data Collection and Protection'
output: We collect your personal data to provide our services, and your data is protected in accordance with applicable regulations using encryption and secure storage.

instruction: What rights do I have regarding my personal data?
input: Terms and Conditions for Banking Services, section 'Customer Rights'
output: You have the right to access, rectify, and delete your personal data. To exercise these rights, please contact us, and we will respond within 30 days.

instruction: Who is responsible if my account is used without my authorization?
input: Terms and Conditions for Banking Services, section 'Bank Responsibility'
output: While we strive to provide quality services, we are not liable for losses resulting from unauthorized use of your account. It is your responsibility to keep your login credentials secure.

instruction: How can I close my bank account?
input: Terms and Conditions for Banking Services, section 'Account Closure'
output: To close your bank account, contact our customer service. Please note that any outstanding fees or charges must be settled before the account can be closed.

instruction: What is the procedure for resolving disputes?
input: Terms and Conditions for Banking Services, section 'Dispute Resolution'
output: In case of a dispute, please contact our customer service. We will work with you to resolve the issue, and if necessary, involve a third-party mediator.

instruction: How do I manage my bank cards online?
input: User Manual for Online Banking Services, section 'Managing Bank Cards'
output: You can manage your bank cards through your online account. You can activate, block, or replace your cards easily, and set up transaction alerts for enhanced security.

instruction: How do I schedule recurring payments?
input: User Manual for Online Banking Services, section 'Transfers and Payments'
output: To schedule recurring payments, log in to your account, navigate to the 'Transfers' section, and select the option to schedule recurring payments.

instruction: How can I enable two-factor authentication?
input: User Manual for Online Banking Services, section 'Support and Security'
output: To enhance your account security, enable two-factor authentication from your account settings and ensure your contact information is up to date.

instruction: How do I update my contact information?
input: User Manual for Online Banking Services, section 'Support and Security'
output: Log in to your online account and update your profile with your current contact details to ensure you receive all important notifications.

instruction: What should I do if I encounter technical issues?
input: User Manual for Online Banking Services, section 'Support and Security'
output: If you experience any technical issues, please contact our customer service immediately for assistance.

instruction: How do I make an international transfer?
input: User Manual for Online Banking Services, section 'Transfers and Payments'
output: For international transfers, you will need the beneficiary's bank details. Log in to your account, go to 'Transfers', and follow the instructions provided.
